cards.description: When Y'shtola enters the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Deal it 2000 damage. (1 Wind, Dull), put Y'shtola into the Break Zone: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 7000 damage. You can only use this ability if you control 7 or more Characters.
cards.name: Y'shtola

cards.description: When Garland blocks, Garland gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. When Garland is put from the field into the Break Zone, choose 1 Forward. It gains +4000 power until the end of the turn.
cards.name: Garland

cards.description: The cost required to play Golbez onto the field is reduced by 1 for every 5 cards in your Break Zone. When Golbez enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or less in your Break Zone. Add it to your hand.
cards.name: Golbez
